mapper.insert: insert into orders( order_id, order_date, order_request, total_price, payment, delivery_address, delivery_address_detail, zip, user_id, order_name, order_phone, order_sprice, p_id, delivery_status ) values( #{order_id}, sysdate, #{order_request}, #{total_price}, #{payment}, #{delivery_address}, #{delivery_address_detail}, #{zip}, #{user_id}, #{order_name}, #{order_phone}, #{order_sprice}, #{p_id}, '배송준비중' )
mapper.select: select order_id, order_name, order_phone, order_date, order_request, delivery_address, delivery_address_detail, payment, total_price, order_sprice from orders where order_id = #{order_id}
